Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Coarsely manufactured goblet that is large and deep, with a flat conical base, restricted mouth and simple lip. It is brown-pink in colour and bears black patches on the exterior surface, which are the result of fire clouding. The horizontal polish was more carefully applied on the inside than on the outside.
